description: Siamese cats are known for their striking blue eyes and sleek, short coat. They are very vocal and affectionate.
Maine Coons are one of the largest domesticated cat breeds. They have a distinctive long, bushy tail and tufted ears.
Luxurious long fur and a calm, affectionate personality.
Exotic, leopard-like appearance with a playful and active demeanor.
Known for their docile and placid temperament; they often go limp when picked up.
Sturdy build with dense, plush coat and round face; generally calm and easygoing.
Sleek, slender body with a ticked tabby coat; very active and playful.
Hairless breed with a wrinkled skin and friendly, energetic personality.
Distinctive folded ears; sweet, gentle nature.
Elegant blue-gray coat and green eyes; known for being shy but loyal.
Adapted to cold climates with a dense coat; large, strong build.
Similar to Siamese in body type but with a wide variety of colors and patterns.
Silky, medium-length coat; playful and affectionate.
Tall, lean body with large ears and spots; known for their high energy and intelligence.
Curly, soft coat and large ears; known for being mischievous and playful.
Curly, soft coat and large ears; known for being mischievous and playful.
